name: March iRacing Hood Sponsorship
description: Vehicle sponsorship for all races run in iRacing for dates between March 22nd - 28th. Company logo to be placed on hood or front bumper depending on racecar. Includes 2 social post, and overlays on Twitch streams. Once purchased, please email 0xracingdao@gmail.com to complete the process. After sponsorship period, this token will convert to a Proof of Sponsorship collectible.
